summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4128 for the improvement of alley, Block 12, Cove Addition, being the alley between 2nd Avenue West and 3rd Avenue West, from West Howe Street to West Crockett Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 49463, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
